thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 4 of 716
thread.title: RAYMOND
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by RAYMOND

author: RAYMOND
title: RAYMOND
text: Easy to book prior to arrival. Easy check-in at counter and car was ready to get in and drive away. Car was very clean on all accounts and company personnel was available before driving away to assist if needed. Impressed with Redspot as hadn't used them before and would certainly do again in the future. Rates very reasonable. Car mechanically could have been serviced and checked, although no issues, I believe it was due for a service and check up.Indicator was showing on instrument panel as being due.
